comment: Smart Data Models - ExcAVR2 adapted to DTDL from smartdatamodels.org. Source: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/smart-data-models/dataModel.EnergyCIM/master/ExcAVR2/schema.json
description: Adapted from CIM data models. Italian excitation system corresponding to IEEE (1968) Type 2 Model. It represents alternator and rotating diodes and electromechanic voltage regulators.

contents.name: alternateName
contents.comment: An alternative name for this item

contents.name: areaServed
contents.comment: The geographic area where a service or offered item is provided

contents.name: dataProvider
contents.comment: A sequence of characters identifying the provider of the harmonised data entity.

contents.name: dateCreated
contents.comment: Entity creation timestamp. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: dateModified
contents.comment: Timestamp of the last modification of the entity. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: description
contents.comment: A description of this item

contents.name: e1
contents.comment: Field voltage value 1 (E1).  Typical Value = 4.18. Default: 0.0

contents.name: e2
contents.comment: Field voltage value 2 (E2).  Typical Value = 3.14. Default: 0.0

contents.name: ka
contents.comment: AVR gain (K).  Typical Value = 500. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kf
contents.comment: Rate feedback gain (K).  Typical Value = 0.02. Default: 0.0

contents.name: name
contents.comment: The name of this item.

contents.name: se1
contents.comment: Saturation factor at E1 (S(E1)).  Typical Value = 0.1. Default: 0.0

contents.name: se2
contents.comment: Saturation factor at E2 (S(E2)).  Typical Value = 0.03. Default: 0.0

contents.name: source
contents.comment: A sequence of characters giving the original source of the entity data as a URL. Recommended to be the fully qualified domain name of the source provider, or the URL to the source object.

contents.name: ta
contents.comment: AVR time constant (T).  Typical Value = 0.02. Default: 0

contents.name: tb
contents.comment: AVR time constant (T).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

contents.name: te
contents.comment: Exciter time constant (T).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0

contents.name: tf1
contents.comment: Rate feedback time constant (T).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0

contents.name: tf2
contents.comment: Rate feedback time constant (T).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0

contents.name: vrmn
contents.comment: Maximum AVR output (V).  Typical Value = -6. Default: 0.0

contents.name: vrmx
contents.comment: Minimum AVR output (V).  Typical Value = 7. Default: 0.0

contents.name: owner
contents.comment: A List containing a JSON encoded sequence of characters referencing the unique Ids of the owner(s)

contents.name: address
contents.comment: The mailing address
